settings_command_current_english: Now the bot speaks in: 🇬🇧 English
settings_command_current_italian: Now the bot speaks in: 🇮🇹 Italian
settings_command_switchlanguage: 🌎 Choose the language of the bot
about_command_error: The correct format is: /about @nickname example: /about @ptkdev. Try again!
set_select_button: Choose the button you want to change:
set_command_facebook: Type the link or nickname of your 👮‍♂️ Facebook profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_instagram: Type the link or nickname of your 📷 Instagram profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_twitter: Type the link or nickname of your 🐣 Twitter profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_linkedin: Type the link or nickname of your 💼 LinkedIn profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_youtube: Type the link or nickname of your 📺 Youtube channel, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_spotify: Type the link or id of your 🎧 Spotify playlist, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_discord: Type the link or id of your 🤖 Discord server, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_tiktok: Type the link or nickname of your 👯‍♀️ TikTok profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_github: Type the link or nickname of your 👨‍💻 GitHub profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_steam: Type the link or nickname of your 🎮 Steam profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_onlyfans: Type the link or nickname of your 🔞 Onlyfans profile, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_amazon: Type the link or id of your wishlist 🎁 Amazon, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_website: Type the link or nickname of your 🌎 Personal website, type in skip if you don't have one
set_command_done: 🚀 Are you done! Try using the command /about @{{username}} to see if everything is ok!
set_command_privacy: Write the list of users (separated from comma) which can use the command /about to show your links, example: @user1, @user2 Type in "public profile" if you want to allow everyone to use the command /about and see your social media
about_command_show_links_error: 🚨 One of the URLs is not valid, it must start with https:// 🔧 Fix it with /set or try again /start
hears_command_privacy_not_auth: 🔐 You are not authorized by the user to see its links and social, ask you to insert you in the command list of /privacy
hears_command_bad_url: 🚨 The inserted URL is invalid, it must start with https:// 🔧 Fix it with /set or try again /start
about_command_user_not_found: 😿 The user @{{username}} did not set his profiles, ask him to do it by typing in private to the bot: @{{bot_nickname}}
start_command_nickname_empty: 🚷 You have not set a nickname in your telegram account: enter the settings of the app and insert one, then you do again /start
start_command_intro_group: This bot allows you to share your social profiles and links with Telegram users. Use the command /about @nickname to see a user's profiles and links, for example: /about @ptkdev Type in private to @{{bot_nickname}} to set your links and social media.
ral_command_error: The correct format is: /ral @nickname example: /ral @ptkdev. Try again!
